items.description: Choose 3 of the following: saint-andré (cow), gorgonzola dulce (cow), midnight moon (goat), salame toscano (pork), salame calabrese (pork). cheese platters are served with: whole grain mustard, cornichon, caper berry, dried apricot, baguette
